name: A Mr Mom Quest
description:
Compo submission for LD#39.

Creator: Josh Burleson (Code, Art, Music, etc)

How To Play: 
A = Move Left
D = Move Right
J,K and L are used to do tasks when prompted.
Keep the task from falling below 1% or it will fail.

Goal:
Try to keep you sanity as long as you can.

Note:
This game was made as a parody in self deprecating humor. Please do not take this game seriously.

Thanks:
A big thanks to my wife for watching our son so I could do Ludum Dare #39.
